resources.string: With Geki you will be able to identify anything on your path:

• A bird flying by,
• A mysterious new plant,
• An insect on your terrace,
• A flower you were given,
•• A mushroom in the forest,
• A fruit at an exotic market,
• An animal footprint on the ground,
• A seashell picked up on the beach,
• A stone on a necklace,
• etc…
Just take a photo to get an answer in seconds
We offer you the best models in the world. Select from our three levels of identification, each offering increasing analytical depth.
Whether on a stroll or traveling, you will soon know and recognize all the nature around you
To use the application, you must now connect with Google and accept the necessary permissions.
This application needs access to your camera to capture and analyze photos of plants and animals.
Access to your location improves the accuracy of species identification based on your region.
Access to your photos allows you to analyze existing images from your gallery.
